reviewText: Prison Tycoon Alcatraz is yet another corpse in the Prison Tycoon series that keeps on stinking up the morgue - which in this crap metaphor is Steam. The UI is awful, the graphics are atrocious, and the gameplay - once you've got your guards and prisoners and assigned jobs - consists of sitting around twiddling your thumbs. It's charmless and borderline unplayable if you have any concept of fun. If you want a decent prison game, might I suggest Prison Architect instead.
